unnormalised: **Dekh, Tuka Corporate Law Kitem Mhunn Thauk Asa, Kai? Kamar Kas, Buttercup!**
normalised: **Tor, Tumkam Corporate Law Zanna Asa Distai, Haa? Kamar Kas, Bhurgepona!**

unnormalised: Borem asa lokanno, ami Corporate Law vixim uloum-ia. Atam, tumi mahogany mesam ani pinstripe suit-amchem chitr divunkche adim, mhaka tumkam sangonk dium, ti chodd korun "Suits" nhoi ani aizkal "sweatpants" zata, khas korun 2020 uprant! Punn, daav unch asat, jargon zattt asa, ani vinashachi xokyota? Oh, tem sadaiv harit asa, babu! Tem mullikuch Bollywood, punn komi nach numbers ani chodd paperwork.
normalised: Borem asa ixttanno, ami Corporate Law vixim uloum-ia. Atam, tumi mahogany desk ani pinstripe suit kalpota munnosor, hanv tumkam sangtam, tea vellar “Suits” por’mannem unnem asta ani “sweatpants” por’mannem odik asta, khas korun don hazar ani vis zalea uprant! Punn, daav unch asat, jargon zat aasa, ani virodhachi xokteem? Oh, tem sadaach panvoll asta, bhurgepona! Tem multhah bollywood-aa por’mannem asta, punn kam dance number ani odik paperwork-aan.

unnormalised: Poilem kitem, Corporate Law *mhonnllear* kitem? Ti businessakhatir rulebook asa. Tika companyankhatir "ghar ka niyam" (gharachim niyom) mhonn chint, punn chodd vhoddlem, kaideache nodren bandhun dovorlelem scale-ar. Ti companyachi nondnni korunk (tem MCA website, hanv sarkho asanv, kai?) zoddni, tabeant ghevnni, ani bhiranticho "winding up" – zo mullikuch eka companyache nodren khubuch, *khubuch* vaitt zhogddo.
normalised: Poilech pavti, Corporate Law *mhonnje* kitem? Tem businessesakhatir rulebook asa. Companiesakhatir “ghar ka niyam” (ghorche niyam) por’mannem chintat, punn odik vhodd, kanoonee boddonakai asa. Tem company registar korpaa (tem M-C-A website, hanv sori?) thaun mergers, acquisitions, ani dukhacho “winding up” – zo asa corporate equivalent ani ekdom, *ekdom* vaitt breakupa por’mannem asa.

unnormalised: Atam, tumi chintat astolem, “Punn hanv ek lhan chai stall cholovnk dita, mhaka khorench he vostu thauk asunk zai?” Ani zop, mhojea ixtta, “HOI!” tum ek mai ani bapui dukan asa va Tata sarkhem vhoddlem conglomerate, tumi corporate sandbox-ant khelltat. Niyom zannun tumkam kottham bandunk modot karta, va ratyeche kottham nhoi je litigations-ache poile lharant ubhoun vhaitan. Chintat tumkam "chaiwala.com" vaprunk ek kaideachi notice melltta zaka konnem-i trademark keli asli zalear. Borem nhoi, kai?
normalised: Atam, tumi chintat astole, “Punn hanv ek lhan chai stall choloitam, mhaka khorench hem zanna zai?” Ani jabab, mozo ixtta, asa ekdom “HOI!” Tumi ek mom-ani-pop dukaan astolo vo Tata por’mannem phantavlolo conglomerate, tumi corporate sandbox-aan kheltat. Niyam zannem tumkam kotto bandpak madat karta, reticho kotto nhoi zo poilo litigationacho darya pois karta. Kalpo tumkam "chaiwala dot com" vapornache khatir legal notice mell’lle, zo trademark kosleankhaun asa. Borro nhoi, sori?

unnormalised: "MoA" (Memorandum of Association) ani "AoA" (Articles of Association) vixim uloum-ia. Hi mullavelean companyachem zolmachem pramaanpatr ani cholovpachi pustika asa. MoA mhonnche companyachem LinkedIn profile - lakx, uddes ani nondnnecho karyalayacho patto (zoxe "10, Downing Street, Mumbai, 400001"). AoA? To lakx koso sadhya korcho tanchi suchovnni pustika asa. Tanchi gholl kor nakat tor tumi khub uxar vakil sodtat.
normalised: Ami "M-o-A" (Memorandum of Association) ani "A-o-A" (Articles of Association) vixim uloum-ia. He multhah companycho zolmachi certificate ani vaprachakhatir pustok asa. M-o-A companycho L-inked I-n profile por’mannem chintat – themcho goal, uddes, ani registered office address (jem "ten, Downing Street, Mumbai, four hundred thousand and one" asa). A-o-A? Tem instruction manual asa tem goal pori korpakhatir. Tem misll naka kor mhunnosor tumi ekdom maharg lawyer sodtat.

unnormalised: Ani uprant Companies Act, 2013 asa. Ho Bharotant Corporate Law-acho vhoddlo Daddy asa. Tem companyankhatir Sanvidhanaxarokem asa. Tacheant sogllem asa - directoram, shareholderam, boska (khubuch vhodd boska), audits ani ani borech. Hanv tumkam komit komi thodde sections zannam zalear sangtam; Section 135 tumi CSR-ant asat va Section 447 tumi fraud-acher ek expert zaunk sodtat zalear.
normalised: Ani tea vellar Companies Act asa, don hazar ani tera. Hem Bharatant Corporate Lawcho Vhodd Daddy asa. Tem companykhatir Constitution por’mannem asa. Tem sabb aaasa – directors, shareholders, meeting (zoom ani zoom meetings), audits, ani odik vixim niyam asat. Hanv tumkam atli kamit section zanna zai sangtam; Section one hundred and thirty five jar tumkam C-S-R vo Section four hundred and forty seven jar tumi fraud-aacher expert zanna asa zalear.

unnormalised: Atam, ami khorea mojjeche vostuvixim uloum-ia: mergers ani acquisitions (M&A). Hi zaga jecompanyanche corporate satranj khelonk suru kortat. Ambani sogllem viktem gheta mhonn chint. Ek company dusrek gilta va don vhodd giants ek mega-giant zaunk nirnnoy ghetat. Tem sogllem khub ruchichem asa, tum "restructured" zaunk melltele karmacharyeantle tum ek zalear nhoi. 2008 uprant tem khub zannamni dekhlam!
normalised: Atam, ami khorech fun stuff-a vixin uloum-ia: mergers ani acquisitions (M ani A). He ek corporate chess khelpak survaat karta. Ambani sabb voston viktim gheta por’mannem chintat. Ek company dusreank gollun gheta, vo don giants ek mega-giant zanvak nirnnay ghetat. Tem sabb excitement zannem asta, mhunnosor tumi employee asat zannem "restructured" zatat. Don hazar ani aat zatlea uprant sabb dekhla!

unnormalised: Punn, sogle legalese ani spreadsheets-am modem, monshachoch ghatak visrunk nakaat. Corporate Law fakt ankdde ani niyom nhoi. Tem lokam vixim asa - karmachari, shareholders, grahak, tenna vada pav vikpi lok office bhair asat. Tanchi jivika, tanchi sopnam, tanchi axa sogli tolent hanga utarleli asa. Tor ami fakt vostavik, niti zannva ani azun ani ami corporate sonvsar thoddo komi kapnecho karunk xakta ani thoddo chodd…bor, Bollywood sarkho.
normalised: Punn, sabh legalese ani spreadsheets bhitor, ami monis element naka visrom-ia. Corporate Law mhunnje fokot numbers ani niyaman vixin nhoi. Tem monxa vixim asa – employees, shareholders, customers, office building bhair vada pav vikpi por’mannem. Themchi jivitak, themchi dukhon, themchi umed sabb balance asat. Mhunn, ami tem khorem dovri, tem ethical dovri, ani sodanch, zait tor, ami corporate world kamit cutthroat korta, ani kamit odik…borinch, Bollywood.

unnormalised: Tor, thoda apmaan korop, punn axea asa mahiti, Corporate Law-achea sonvsarant jhankun dekhlam. Ugddas dovorat, tem fakt thoddesh uddi marop nhoi; tem kiteim sthir, niti ani azun thoddem mojjechem bandhun dovorchem asa. Atam fuddem voch, corporate zongl jikh ani tumcho humor ghevnk visrunk naka. Tumkam tanchi goroz poddteli! Oh, ani ek boro vakil-ui gheun voch. Tumi ek decent lok mellounk "top corporate lawyers Mumbai" sodunk suru korunk zai. Xubhamxem!
normalised: Mhunn, tumka tem asa. Kamit irreverent, punn bori xikkol, Corporate Law vixin. Ugddas dovri, tem fokot bottom line vixin nhoi; tem sustainable, ethical, ani kamit odik fun bandpakhatir asa. Atam poira vocha, corporate jungle zikha, ani tumchi hasyachi umed gheun vocha. Tuka zai zatoli! Oh, ani boro lawyer, tori. Tumi sodta astole “top corporate lawyers Mumbai” boro sodpak. Borem zaum!
